profileAlternative.name: David Baker
profileAlternative.headline: Lead Database Engineer at Epic Games
profileAlternative.summary:
I just started my new role at Epic Games and I am very excited to be part of the team.

I love being a DBA and look forward to working on the most difficult problems that exist in my field.

Specialties:
Performance tuning.
Problem resolution.
Disaster recovery / High availability.
Design and DB Architecture.

aboutAlternative.text:

positions.title:
Title
Manager, DBA Services at Everbridge

Title
Lead DBA - DB2 LUW & MongoDB

educations.title: State University of New York College at Plattsburgh

given.text: Dave and I have worked together for 8 years. I have managed him directly for the past 3. Dave's technical ability pertaining, in particular, to UDB is unparalleled in my experience. He is the Go-To person for any and all issues UDB in my team and beyond.

Dave is hands down the most technical database person I have ever met. As having been a senior database administrator, I know the difference in talent. He is exceptional in SQL and performance tuning. I would put his skills up against just about anyone in the Northeast. This is NOT a hallow recommendation - he earned it.

received.text: I have worked with Susan for over 15 years while I was at MetLife.  She is a true expert in DBMS technologies and was crucial in most of most of our large scale projects.  She is a proven team leader and gets the job done.  I am certain she will be successful member of any organization that is lucky enough to have her on their team.

Joe is a gifted programmer with tremendous SQL skills.  He is able code statements even beyond that of the most Sr. DBAs.  He has coded elegant solutions to extremely complicated financial applications that performed and scaled well past the original requirements.  I am confident that he can meet or exceed any challenge he sets his mind to. He would make a wonderful addition to any team as a Sr. Programmer or DBA.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Results Oriented Technology Specialist | Lead Design and Implementation | Project Manager and Business Liaison
